articles.author: Jonathan Noble
articles.title: “Frustrated” Ford demands urgent resolution to Red Bull's Horner investigation - Autosport
articles.description: Ford has added to the pressure on Red Bull to complete its investigation into the allegations surrounding its Formula 1 team principal Christian Horner.
articles.content: As silence continues on the progress of Red Bull's probe into allegations made against Horner by a female employee, Ford has upped the ante in urging the energy drinks company to get on with matters.… [+2511 chars]
